subject: Police
Football
Assaults
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Police arrested Tulane running back Ray Boudreaux in connection with a stabbing in New Orleans that left five people hurt last weekend. Boudreaux was arrested early yesterday at his home in Metairie, La., on five counts of attempted murder, according to the police, who said the knife used in the stabbings was found in his house. Tulane suspended Boudreaux from the university and the team.
